item.title: FirstPost
item.description: Test for Github Page List Order //export pthJob func pthJob(ptr unsafe.Pointer) unsafe.Pointer { rank := int(*(*float64)(ptr)) sliceLen := length if rank == size-1 { sliceLen += left } result := buildSlice(sliceLen, ptr) tasks := generateTask(rank, size) for i := range tasks { result[i] = mandelbrot(tasks[i]) } return nil }
